title: Lost
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Lost par Lucky Rose
I, oh I
Remember the moment, tears by the ocean
In your eyes, your eyes
Were telling me: Stay for just one more day
Don't say goodbye tonight
Let's follow this feeling, dare you to leave
The world behind, let time go by

Let's get lost together
You and me lost forever young
Searching for something better
Everything I need is right in front of me

Let's get lost
Let's get lost
Let's get lost

Let's get lost
Let's get lost together
You and me lost forever young
Searching for something better
Everything I need is right in front of me

They may say
We're young, dumb and dreaming, drunk on a feeling
Kids at play, I say
We're better off children than the tradition
Grown up slaves in gold chains
Biding their time for the rest of their lives
But youth won't fade if we stay the same

Let's get lost together
You and me lost forever young
Searching for something better

Everything I need is right in front of me

Let's get lost
Let's get lost
Let's get lost
Let's get lost
Let's get lost together
You and me lost forever young
Searching for something better
Everything I need is right in front of me
